snippet: “I give Kobe a lot of credit for standing up for his team,” David Robinson said of Kobe Bryant’s claim that this year’s Olympic basketball squad could beat the 1992 Dream Team.
abstract: “I give Kobe a lot of credit for standing up for his team,” David Robinson said of Kobe Bryant’s claim that this year’s Olympic basketball squad could beat the 1992 Dream Team.

headline.main: 30 Seconds With David Robinson: The Stuff Dreams Are Made Of
